function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Respiratory virus transmission dynamics influenced by multiple architectural and environmental factors","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission in built environments","Mitigation":"Improvement of design and maintenance of HVAC systems, lighting systems, sewage systems, environmental cleaning practices, space arrangement, furniture configurations, and occupant behaviors","Technologies":"Advanced aerosol sensors, real-time monitoring systems, and building management technology","People":"Building occupants, facility managers, public health authorities","Owner":"Facility managers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of cost-effectiveness and outcome studies in space management for infection control","Impact":"Inadequate evidence for justifying investment in infection control technologies and strategies","Mitigation":"Conducting cost-benefit analysis of technology adoption, studying the cost-effectiveness of space management interventions, and evaluating the impact of infection control strategies on employee health and productivity","Technologies":"Cost-benefit analysis tools, outcome assessment tools, and productivity assessment tools","People":"Facility managers, decision-makers, researchers","Owner":"Facility managers, research institutions, decision-makers"},{"Description":"Complexity of evaluating the risk of SARS-CoV-2 infection in indoor environments","Impact":"Potential inability to effectively assess and mitigate the risk of SARS-CoV-2 transmission","Mitigation":"Development and utilization of advanced risk evaluation tools specific to SARS-CoV-2, integration of real-time monitoring systems, and continuous research on virus transmission dynamics","Technologies":"Advanced risk evaluation tools, real-time monitoring systems, and research platforms","People":"Facility managers, public health authorities, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, public health authorities"}]}
